metadata.title: CVE-2018-20242 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: A carefully crafted URL could trigger an XSS vulnerability on ApacheJSPWiki, from versions up to 2.10.5, which could lead to session hijacking.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
